Title: The Marriage of Maria Braun
Writer: Pea Fröhlich (screenplay), Peter Märthesheimer (screenplay), Rainer Werner Fassbinder (idea), Pea Fröhlich (dialogue), Rainer Werner Fassbinder (dialogue), Peter Märthesheimer (dialogue)
Actors: Hanna Schygulla, Klaus Löwitsch, Ivan Desny, Gisela Uhlen
Plot: This movie follows the life of a young German woman, married to a soldier in the waning days of WWII. Fassbinder has tried to show the gritty life after the end of WWII and the turmoil of the people trapped in its wake.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 13 wins & 5 nominations.
Production: Trio Film, Fengler Films, Westdeutscher Rundfunk, Albatros Produktion, Filmverlag der Autoren, Tango Film
